name: Dawson v. Pennsylvania Power Company, Appellant

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Jones, Cohen, Bok and McBride, JJ.
parties: Dawson v. Pennsylvania Power Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
The Court being evenly divided, the judgment of the lower Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: William A. Challener, Jr., with Mm Dale Cleland, and E. V. Buckley, for appellant.
John E. Evans, Jr., with him Evans, Ivory & Evans, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Dawson v. Pennsylvania Power Company, Appellant.
Argued October 2, 1959.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Jones, Cohen, Bok and McBride, JJ.
December 30, 1959:
reargument refused February 12, 1960.
William A. Challener, Jr., with Mm Dale Cleland, and E. V. Buckley, for appellant.
John E. Evans, Jr., with him Evans, Ivory & Evans, for appellee.
